resource.name: Resources Folder
resource.help: Default resource folder ( Do not end with / )

namespace.name: Namespace
namespace.help: Default namespace for models ( Do not end with / )

model.name: Model
model.help: Set default check for model creation

required.name: test
required.help: Set default true or false based on column options. If is disabled required will be always unchecked

sortable.name: Sortable
sortable.help: Set default true or false based on column options. If is disabled sortable will be always unchecked

hidden.name: Hidden Fields
hidden.help: Add the column names you want to hide in the fields edition
